data.title: Shopify Help Center
data.meta_description: Using Shopify Payments for merchants in supported countries.
data.text:
Supported countries for Shopify Payments

Shopify Payments is available only to stores in certain countries.

If you operate a retail store, then refer to the list of retail countries that are supported by Shopify Payments.

Refer to the following sections to find the requirements and related information for each country that is supported for Shopify Payments.

Australia

Austria

Belgium

Canada

Czechia

Denmark

Finland

France

Germany

Hong Kong SAR

Ireland

Italy

Japan

Netherlands

New Zealand

Portugal

Romania

Singapore

Spain

Sweden

Switzerland

United Kingdom

United States

If the type of business you run is not supported by Shopify Payments, then review the list of other payment gateways that Shopify supports.
